data.content:
noun
plural ~ shots
[count] an attempt or effort that is not likely to be successful
I hope to double my profits, but I know that's a long shot.
chiefly US :a person or thing that is not likely to win something (such as a contest or race)
The horse was a long shot, but we bet on him anyway.
She always bets on long shots at the racetrack.
a political long shot
by a long shot
by a great extent or degree :by far
It was the biggest problem we hadby a long shot.
not by a long shot
not at all
Our work isn't done yet, not by a long shot. [=we still have a lot more work to do]
